Package org.jetel.plugin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Extension
    This class represents extension point of engine.
    ExtensionParameter
    This class represents extension's parameter.
    PluginActivator
    Class witch can be inherited by all plugin main class.
    PluginClassLoader
    Plugin class loader is descendant of URLClassLoader and is used for particular plugins.
    PluginDescriptionBuilder
    XML builder for plugin descriptor.
    PluginDescriptor
    This class describes plugin.
    PluginLocation
    This class represent a location of a clover engine plugin.
    PluginRepositoryLocation
    This class represents a location of a clover engine plugin repository, for instance .
    Plugins
    This class contains all static method, which provide access to all loadable plugins.
